---
title: "Fill in your information"
description: "Please we would like your biography information to populate the landing pages. Therefore, we are requested to share their biography information and a photo. Therefore, we are cordially requesting you to fill in the information in the form."
page-layout: article
title-block-banner: true

format: 
  html:
    include-in-header: 
    - file: submit_form.md
    toc: true

form:
  id: MyFormID
  submit: "Submit"
  action: "javascript:submit()"
  method: GET
  fields:
  - name: Text1
    type: text
    id: textid
    label: "First name"
    required: true
  - name: Text2
    type: text
    id: textid2
    label: "Surname"
    required: true
  - name: Radio
    type: radio
    label: "Choose your title"
    id: radio1
    values:
    - text: Mr
      value: 1
    - text: Ms
      value: 0
  - text: --- # a spacer
  - name: Checkbox
    type: checkbox
    id: checkbox1
    label: "Choose (multiple) nature of the insitution your affiliated"
    values:
    - text: "Goverment"
      value: "go"
    - text: "Research"
      value: "re"
    - text: "Academic"
      value: "ac"
    - text: "NGO"
      value: "ng"
    - text: "Private"
      value: "pr"
    - text: "Others"
      value: "or"
  - text: ---
  - name: Checkbox
    type: checkbox
    id: checkbox2
    label: "Choose (multiple) software you use for data analysis"
    values:
    - text: "SPSS"
      value: "sp"
    - text: "Excel"
      value: "ex"
    - text: "R"
      value: "r"
    - text: "OriginPro"
      value: "or"
    - text: "SigmaPlot"
      value: "si"
    - text: "Python"
      value: "py"
    - text: "MATLAB"
      value: "mt"
    - text: "QGIS"
      value: "qg"
    - text: "ESRI"
      value: "es"
    - text: "None of the Above"
      value: "no"
  - text: ---
  - name: Selector
    type: select
    id: selector1
    label: What is your highest academic level?
    multiple: true #multiple selections?
    size: 3 #number to size
    values:
    - text: Primary
      value: 1
    - text: Secondary
      value: 2
    - text: Bachelor
      value: 3
    - text: Master
      value: 4
    - text: PhD
      value: 5
  - text: ---  
  - name: BigText
    id: textarea1
    type: textarea
    label: Please write your short biography that describe you. Key issues include your name, affiliated institutions, your expertise and why you have joined for this class
    width: 30 #in rows
    height: 30 #in cols
  - name: MyEmail
    id: email1
    type: email
    label: "Enter your email"
  - name: FileUpload
    id: file1
    type: file
    label: Upload your profile picture
---
